description: This file defines the Bootstrap modal component (version 3.2.0), including the Modal class, its methods for showing, hiding, and managing modal dialogs, and the jQuery plugin interface for Bootstrap modals.

classes.name: Modal
classes.description: Class representing the Bootstrap modal component, managing modal dialog behavior and interactions.

methods.name: enforceFocus
methods.description: Ensures focus remains within the modal when it is open.

methods.name: escape
methods.description: Handles escape key press to close the modal if enabled.

methods.name: hideModal
methods.description: Hides the modal element and triggers related events.

methods.name: backdrop
methods.description: Manages the creation and removal of the modal backdrop.

methods.name: checkScrollbar
methods.description: Checks if scrollbar adjustments are needed when modal is shown.

methods.name: setScrollbar
methods.description: Adjusts body padding to account for scrollbar width.

methods.name: resetScrollbar
methods.description: Resets body padding after modal is hidden.

methods.name: measureScrollbar
methods.description: Measures the width of the scrollbar.
